pf_init_params Struct Reference


Data Fields

uint16_t pf_mode
uint16_t width
uint16_t height
uint16_t stride

Detailed Description

Structure for Post Filter initialization parameters.

Field Documentation

uint16_t height

Height of frame in pixels

uint16_t pf_mode

Post filter operation mode

uint16_t stride

Stride of Y plane in pixels. Stride for U and V planes is half Y stride

uint16_t width

Width of frame in pixels
